messages.title: Protect our NHS
messages.content: We think it's unfair that hospitals and health centres are treated like businesses rather than vital public services. We want to make sure no more public money is wasted on badly implemented privatisation schemes. Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are locally accessed and truly local. We will oppose further cuts, closures to easy access and privatisation within our NHS and protest the loss of jobs of public sector workers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low earning workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families. We will fight for a fair financial deal, with community banks, credit unions and mutuals providing realistic loans to families and small businesses.

Green MPs propose a free insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs. Green Party councillors have already pioneered such a scheme in Kirklees.

issues.health: Green MPs will fight to make sure local services are locally accessed and truly local. We will oppose further cuts, closures to easy access and privatisation within our NHS and protest the loss of jobs of public sector workers.

housing.content: Green MPs propose a free insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills.

quotes.text: Greens are ahead! Our 'green' policies on climate change, renewable energy and recycling policies established us as the world environmental political force before the main political parties had imagined there might be such crucial issues. Greens now sit in the European Parliament, the Scottish Parliament, the London Assembly and on councils from Brighton to Leeds to Norwich.
quotes.source: Green World - the Green Party magazine
